item.description:
More folks can still come, but will need to bring their own chairs.

If you're arriving late, please bring your own chair and we'll do our best to squeeze you in. It will be difficult to save seats or space.

CLICK HERE FOR WEATHER UPDATES.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

PRESCOTT PARK ARTS FESTIVAL presents SHAWN COLVIN

SHAWN COLVIN - June 27, 2012

We are thrilled to welcome back Shawn Colvin who stands out among female singer-songwriters of today as a singular and enduring talent, with ten albums and three Grammy Awards (including Record of the Year, Song of the Year). This South Dakota-born folk-rocker is known for her unmistakable vocals and matchless guitar stylings, and offers music that is honest and warm-hearted. With a brand new album in hand, don't miss this incredible performer.

-These concerts are very well attended. Arrive as early as possible.

-Bring a chair or blanket - and picnic food if you wish.

- Meet by 6pm.  Music starts at 7pm.  It might be difficult to find us if you arrive after the music begins...

THERE IS A SUGGESTED DONATION AT THE DOOR.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Liability Release

AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and his heirs, and all members and participants of the Seacoast Outdoors Meetup group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with this meetup. Kayaking, camping, hiking, bicycling, snow sports, alcohol consumption, and other activities pose inherent risks and dangers. Participation in these activities is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.
item.name: Prescott Park Arts Festival: Shawn Colvin
